sentences.en: A dense and caramelly - sweet espresso shot softened a dollop of whipped cream.
sentences.cn: 一团轻柔的鲜忌廉,漂浮在特浓咖啡的顶端,完全满足您对鲜忌廉的喜好.

sentences.en: Everyone could do with a dollop of goodness.
sentences.cn: 每个人都能奉献的美德.

sentences.en: I added a dollop of vanilla ice-cream to the pie.
sentences.cn: 我在馅饼里加了一块香草冰激凌。

sentences.en: I look over and feel a great dollop of affection.
sentences.cn: 望过去,感受到了一股巨大的温情.

sentences.en: I look over at Other Half and feel a great dollop of affection.
sentences.cn: 我向我的另一半望过去,感受到了一股巨大的温情.

sentences.en: It is a sweet soup made of beets, onion, a bit of sugar, and lemon juice. Cold borscht is often garnished with a dollop of sour cream at the center of the bowl.
sentences.cn: 它是用甜菜、洋葱、少许糖和柠檬汁做成的一种甜汤，通常会在碗中间放一块酸奶油作装饰。

sentences.en: It means more bets can be made with a given dollop of capital.
sentences.cn: 这意味着定量资本有更高的杠杆力.

sentences.en: Lightly toasted, with a dollop of cream cheese.
sentences.cn: 轻烤加一大块奶油干酪.

sentences.en: She put a dollop if ice - cream in each bowl.
sentences.cn: 她在每个碗里放了一团冰淇淋.

sentences.en: She put a dollop if ice-cream in each bowl.
sentences.cn: 她在每个碗里放了一团冰淇淋。

sentences.en: With improvement of the machine tool, dollop manufacture method renews continuously too.
sentences.cn: 扇形块的加工方法随着机床的升级改进也在不断更新.

sentences.en: Yoda wiped his eyes, flinging a dollop of mush Obi - Wan's way yet saying nothing.
sentences.cn: 尤达擦了擦眼睛, 猛力把一团麦片粥往 奥比万 的方向丢过来,不过他到底什么也没说.

trans.tran_en: a small amount of soft food, usually dropped from a spoon

trans.tran_cn: 啪地落下；噗通一声坠落
